overview: Huangmei Opera film.  Feng Suzhen (Yan Fengying) and Li Zhaoting (Chen Wenming) have been reading together since childhood, and have long set up a Mandarin League. However, after the Li family was framed by treacherous officials, the marriage was blocked by Suzhen's stepmother Wang (Huang Fuying), who disliked poverty and loved wealth. Su Zhen keeps her mind unchanged. She makes an appointment with Zhao ting in the back garden to give him a hundred liang of silver and a Jade Kirin. When Wang heard the wind, he sent Zhaoting to officials for investigation in the name of theft, and promised Suzhen to a rich family. Suzhen, who is determined not to leave, escapes from her home. She disguises herself as a man and comes to the capital to find her brother Shaoying (Xiong Shaoyun) who was driven out of her home by Wang.
title: Nü fu ma
